00026 // lbann_early_stopping .hpp .cpp - Callback hooks for early stopping
00028 
00029 #include "lbann/callbacks/lbann_callback_early_stopping.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace lbann {
00032 
00033 lbann_callback_early_stopping::lbann_callback_early_stopping(int64_t patience) :
00034   patience(patience), last_acc(0.0f), wait(0) {}
00035 
00036 void lbann_callback_early_stopping::on_validation_end(model* m) {
00037   DataType acc = m->get_validate_accuracy();
00038   if (acc > last_acc) {
00039     last_acc = acc;
00040     wait = 0;
00041   } else {
00042     if (wait >= patience) {
00043       m->set_terminate_training(true);
00044       if (m->get_comm()->am_model_master()) {
00045         std::cout << "Model " << m->get_comm()->get_model_rank() <<
00046           " terminating training due to early stopping" << std::endl;
00047       }
00048     } else {
00049       ++wait;
00050     }
00051   }
00052 }
00053 
00054 }  // namespace lbann
Generated on 21 Sep 2016 for LBANN by  1.6.1
